mapper.insert: Insert into visitor (cuil, first_name, last_name, address, phone, email) values (#{visitor.cuil}, #{visitor.firstName}, #{visitor.lastName}, #{visitor.address}, #{visitor.phone}, #{visitor.email})
mapper.sql: Select v.id as visitor_id, v.first_name as visitor_first_name, v.last_name as visitor_last_name, v.address as visitor_address, v.phone as visitor_phone, v.email as visitor_email, at.id as attendee_ticket_id, at.cost as attendee_ticket_cost, at.event_id as attendee_ticket_event_id, at.attendee_id as attendee_ticket_attendee_id, at.buyer_id as attendee_ticket_buyer_id, bt.id as buyer_ticket_id, bt.cost as buyer_ticket_cost, bt.event_id as buyer_ticket_event_id, bt.attendee_id as buyer_ticket_attendee_id, bt.buyer_id as buyer_ticket_buyer_id, from visitor v left join ticket at on v.id = at.attendee_id left join ticket bt on v.id = bt.buyer_id
